title: Build a Netflix Clone with React and Firebase
summary: Learn how to build a fully functional Netflix clone using React for the frontend and Firebase for the backend. This tutorial covers authentication, data storage, and creating a dynamic user interface.

title: Build a REST API with Node.js, Express, & MongoDB
summary: A comprehensive guide to building a robust RESTful API from scratch using the popular MERN stack: MongoDB, Express, and Node.js. Perfect for backend developers.

title: Flutter for Beginners
summary: This playlist is the perfect starting point for anyone new to Flutter. You'll learn the fundamentals of the framework and build your first mobile apps for both iOS and Android.

title: Full Stack Next.js 14 Course
summary: Master the latest version of Next.js by building a complete full-stack application. This tutorial covers app router, server components, data fetching, and more.

title: A Complete Guide to CSS Grid
summary: Everything you need to know about CSS Grid Layout. This comprehensive guide from CSS-Tricks covers all the properties and provides practical examples.

title: Intro to Python for Data Science
summary: Get started with Python for data science. This video covers the essential libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib for data analysis and visualization.

title: Vue.js 3 Tutorial for Beginners
summary: Learn Vue.js from the ground up. This playlist covers all the core concepts of Vue 3, including components, the composition API, and routing.

title: React Native Crash Course
summary: Build your first cross-platform mobile app with React Native. This crash course gets you up and running with the basics in no time.

title: How to use the Fetch API
summary: The official MDN documentation on using the Fetch API to make network requests in JavaScript. A go-to resource for any web developer.
